H3.text: How many chambers has the heart. 4

A4.text: The heart has four chambers, two upper atria, the receiving chambers, and two lower ventricles, the discharging chambers.

A5.text: Adult amphibians and most reptiles have a heart with three chambersâ€”two atria and one ventricle.
